# AegisX UI Library

> Enterprise Angular UI component library built on Angular Material with custom theming and design system.

## Overview

AegisX UI (`@aegisx/ui`) is a comprehensive Angular UI library providing:
- 45+ standalone components with `ax-` prefix selectors
- 4 pre-built application layouts
- 8 core services for state management
- Widget framework for dashboard building
- Design token system with CSS custom properties
- Light/Dark theme presets with custom theme support

## Installation & Setup

```typescript
// app.config.ts
import { provideAegisxUI } from '@aegisx/ui';

export const appConfig = {
  providers: [
    provideAegisxUI({
      // Optional configuration
    }),
  ],
};
```

## Import Pattern

All components are standalone and tree-shakable:

```typescript
import {
  AxCardComponent,
  AxThemeSwitcherComponent,
  AxCompactLayoutComponent,
} from '@aegisx/ui';

@Component({
  imports: [AxCardComponent, AxThemeSwitcherComponent],
})
```

---

## Layouts

### AxCompactLayoutComponent
- Selector: `ax-compact-layout`
- Purpose: Sidebar navigation with compact toolbar
- Features: Collapsible sidebar, responsive, theme-aware

### AxEmptyLayoutComponent
- Selector: `ax-empty-layout`
- Purpose: Minimal layout with centered content
- Use cases: Login, error pages, standalone views

### AxEnterpriseLayoutComponent
- Selector: `ax-enterprise-layout`
- Purpose: Full-featured enterprise dashboard layout
- Features: Multiple navigation levels, breadcrumbs, user menu

### AxDocsLayoutComponent
- Selector: `ax-docs-layout`
- Purpose: Documentation site layout (Shadcn/ui style)
- Features: Sidebar navigation, table of contents, search

## Services

### AxThemeService
Theme management with reactive state:
```typescript
inject(AxThemeService).setTheme('dark');
inject(AxThemeService).theme$; // Observable<'light' | 'dark'>
```

### AxToastService
Toast notifications:
```typescript
inject(AxToastService).success('Saved successfully');
inject(AxToastService).error('An error occurred');
```

### AxDialogService
Modal dialog management:
```typescript
inject(AxDialogService).confirm({
  title: 'Delete?',
  message: 'This cannot be undone',
});
```

### AxNavigationService
Navigation state management:
```typescript
inject(AxNavigationService).setNavigation(items);
inject(AxNavigationService).navigation$;
```

### AegisxConfigService
Library configuration:
```typescript
inject(AegisxConfigService).config;
```

### AegisxMediaWatcherService
Responsive breakpoint detection:
```typescript
inject(AegisxMediaWatcherService).onMediaChange('(max-width: 960px)');
```

### AxLoadingBarService
Loading bar control:
```typescript
inject(AxLoadingBarService).show();
inject(AxLoadingBarService).hide();
```

### AegisxIconService
Icon registration and management.

## Theme System

### Built-in Themes
- `lightTheme` - Default light theme
- `darkTheme` - Dark theme
- `brandTheme` - Customizable brand theme

### Theme Provider
```typescript
import { provideAegisxTheme, lightTheme } from '@aegisx/ui';

providers: [
  provideAegisxTheme({
    defaultTheme: lightTheme,
  }),
]
```

### Custom Theme
```typescript
import { createCustomTheme } from '@aegisx/ui';

const myTheme = createCustomTheme({
  primary: '#6366f1',
  secondary: '#ec4899',
  // ...
});
```

---

## Animations

Pre-built animations for common effects:

```typescript
import { expandCollapse, fadeIn, slideInLeft } from '@aegisx/ui';

@Component({
  animations: [expandCollapse, fadeIn, slideInLeft],
})
```

Available: `expandCollapse`, `fadeIn`, `fadeOut`, `slideInLeft`, `slideInRight`, `slideInTop`, `slideInBottom`, `zoomIn`, `zoomOut`, `routerTransition`, `shake`

---

## Widget Framework

Dashboard widget system for building customizable dashboards:

```typescript
import { AxWidgetComponent, AxDashboardComponent } from '@aegisx/ui';
```

## Design Tokens (CSS Variables)

All components use CSS custom properties with `--ax-` prefix:

```css
/* Colors */
--ax-text-primary
--ax-text-secondary
--ax-background-default
--ax-background-subtle
--ax-brand-default
--ax-border-default

/* Spacing */
--ax-spacing-xs: 4px
--ax-spacing-sm: 8px
--ax-spacing-md: 16px
--ax-spacing-lg: 24px
--ax-spacing-xl: 32px

/* Typography */
--ax-text-xs
--ax-text-sm
--ax-text-base
--ax-text-lg
--ax-text-xl
--ax-font-mono

/* Border Radius */
--ax-radius-sm
--ax-radius-md
--ax-radius-lg

/* Shadows */
--ax-shadow-sm
--ax-shadow-md
--ax-shadow-lg
```

## Types & Interfaces

```typescript
import type {
  AxNavigationItem,
  AxNavigation,
  AegisxConfig,
  ThemeConfig,
  LayoutType,
} from '@aegisx/ui';
```

### AxNavigationItem
```typescript
interface AxNavigationItem {
  id: string;
  title: string;
  type?: 'basic' | 'collapsable' | 'group';
  icon?: string;
  link?: string;
  children?: AxNavigationItem[];
  badge?: { title: string; classes?: string };
}
```

├── types/               # TypeScript interfaces

## Common Patterns

### Using a Layout
```typescript
@Component({
  template: `
    <ax-compact-layout>
      <router-outlet />
    </ax-compact-layout>
  `,
  imports: [AxCompactLayoutComponent, RouterOutlet],
})
```

### Theme-Aware Component
```typescript
@Component({
  template: `
    <div [class.dark]="isDark$ | async">
      <!-- content -->
    </div>
  `,
})
export class MyComponent {
  isDark$ = inject(AxThemeService).isDark$;
}
```

### Navigation Setup
```typescript
const navigation: AxNavigationItem[] = [
  {
    id: 'dashboard',
    title: 'Dashboard',
    type: 'basic',
    icon: 'dashboard',
    link: '/dashboard',
  },
  {
    id: 'settings',
    title: 'Settings',
    type: 'collapsable',
    icon: 'settings',
    children: [
      { id: 'profile', title: 'Profile', link: '/settings/profile' },
      { id: 'security', title: 'Security', link: '/settings/security' },
    ],
  },
];
```
